author:
Chuck Barney

title: TV Tonight: 'Gotham' villains are dark and riveting
text:
TV Tonight: 'Gotham' villains are dark and riveting By Chuck Barney Posted: 10/18/2015 04:25:30 PM PDT Updated: 10/18/2015 04:25:31 PM PDT WATCH THIS: 
"Gotham" (8 p.m., Fox): This Batman prequel has been on its game so far this season with a "Rise of the Villains" story line that is dark and riveting. Tonight, Galavan (James Frain) and Penguin (Robin Lord Taylor) join forces with a dangerous family in Gotham. Then, as the rivalry between the Waynes and the Galavans resurfaces, Gordon (Ben McKenzie) struggles to maintain order in the city. 
"Halloween Baking Championship" (9 p.m., Food Network): The five finalists are challenged to create creepy doughnuts. Also on the menu: graveyard pumpkin desserts to die for. 
"Fargo" (10 p.m., FX): If you're not watching Season 2, you're missing some extraordinary television. The snow-capped saga continues tonight as a couple of unlikely murderers struggle to clean up their bloody mess. 
Also on Monday:
